segments.text: You've got a large collection of sample foodstuffs here .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes . We are exporting a wide range of foodstuffs to many countries . And the demand is getting greater and greater.By the way , which items are you interested in ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'm particularly interested in shortbreads . Do you have some samples you could show me ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes . This way , please . Our shortbread is in a variety of flavors , such as almond , walnut , lotus seed , etc . And different packaging has different weights . We can make packages within a reasonable range of any size you require .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: The small sizes are more marketable than the large ones for us . I wonder if Your pastry tastes better .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You are welcome to have a try . Here it is . Ours is of prime quality .
segments.speaker: S1
